questions_and_notes: For consistency with cLitter-tavg-z0-hxy-lnd (cLitter-Lmon) and cLitter-tpt-z0-hxy-lnd (cLitter-Eyr), shouldn't cell methods have "where sector over land"?
cell_methods: area: mean where sector time: point
long_name: Carbon  in Above and Below-Ground Litter Pools on Land-Use Tiles
comment: end of year values (not annual mean)
